pages.text: $(item)Pedestals$() serve as an essential means to bolster one's $(thing)ritualism$() potential. When performing a ritual of any complexity higher than the $(l:ritualism/purification)Ritual of Purification$(), these are required to hold the reagents in it.$(br2)Items can be placed in the $(item)Pedestal$() by right clicking it, and removed in the same manner.
$(item)Pedestals$() are constructed using $(item)Stone$() and alchemically charged materials such as $(l:intro/alchemical_ash)Alchemical Ash$() and $(l:intro/cinnabar)Cinnabar Shards$().

Similarly to $(item)Item Frames$(), the item in the $(item)Pedestal$() may be rotated through a shift-right click, though with an empty hand. Furthermore, the rotation of the item affects the output of any $(item)Comparators$() targeting it.$(br2)For usage in rituals, simply place the pedestal in a block adjacent to the ash that forms the $(l:ritualism/ritual_circle)Ritual Circle$(), the item will be consumed upon the ritual's initiation.
